unsw.venues

Class VenueHireSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • unsw.venues.VenueHireSystem

  • public class VenueHireSystem
extends java.lang.Object
    Venue Hire System for COMP2511. A basic prototype to serve as the "back-end" of a venue hire system. Input and output is in JSON format.
    Author:
    Robert Clifton-Everest

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      VenueHireSystem()
      Instantiates a new VenueHireSystem and initializes a new list of venues and a new list of reservations

      Add a new room to the system
      org.json.JSONObject cancel(java.lang.String id)
      Cancels a reservation by removing reservation object with the given ID from the lists of reservations in the list of rooms in the reservation object as well as the list of reservations in the system.

    • Method Detail

      • addRoom

        public void addRoom(java.lang.String venue,
                    java.lang.String room,
                    java.lang.String size)
        Add a new room to the system

        This method adds a room to the system by adding it to a list of rooms in a venue. If the venue does not already exist, it will be instantiated.

        Parameters:
        venue - Name of venue
        room - Name of room
        size - Size of room

      • request

        public org.json.JSONObject request(java.lang.String id,
                                   java.time.LocalDate start,
                                   java.time.LocalDate end,
                                   int small,
                                   int medium,
                                   int large)
        This method checks if a request for a reservation can be fulfilled. If it can be fulfilled, the reservation will be made. If it cannot be fulfilled, the reservation will not be made.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of reservation
        start - Start date
        end - End date
        small - Number of small rooms required
        medium - Number of medium rooms required
        large - Number of large rooms required
        Returns:
        result of booking

      • cancel

        public org.json.JSONObject cancel(java.lang.String id)
        Cancels a reservation by removing reservation object with the given ID from the lists of reservations in the list of rooms in the reservation object as well as the list of reservations in the system.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of reservation
        Returns:
        Result of cancellation

      • change

        public org.json.JSONObject change(java.lang.String id,
                                  java.time.LocalDate start,
                                  java.time.LocalDate end,
                                  int small,
                                  int medium,
                                  int large)
        Parameters:
        id - ID of reservation
        start - New start date
        end - New end date
        small - New number of small rooms required
        medium - New number of medium rooms required
        large - New number of large rooms required
        Returns:
        Result of change

      • list

        public org.json.JSONArray list(java.lang.String venue)
        Create a list of reservations for each room in a venue. Add the lists into a list to be put into the JSONArray
        Parameters:
        venue - Name of venue
        Returns:
        command result

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
